name: Fine, costs, lien on place
text: §712-1278  Fine, costs, lien on place.  Any attorneys' fees, costs, expenses, and fines imposed against any owner of a business, premises or place in any proceedings under this part shall be a lien upon such business, premises, or place, to the extent of the interest of such person therein, enforceable and collectible by execution issued by the order of the court. [L 1979, c 181, pt of §2; am L 1996, c 246, §9; am L 2004, c 44, §28]
